title: 6.10 client bug?
body:
look
im so frustrated
my ping is 23 so decent internet in Australia
my pc is quite fluent can run most hardcore games like cod
lol ever since the update 6.10, i keep getting disconnected messages, can around 20 tabs of league of legends black screen will open up
i had to restart my client at least 4 times to reconnect properly
this happened 3 times in a row which led to a 5 game banidk what the issue is
it was fine even til 6.9
anyone else have the same issue?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me,

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and a link to your ICSI netalyzr results.

im trying to reconnect again but nothings happening
no client will show up
everytime i press reconnect it just goes to my background app
its running but nothing comes up
it doesnt crash tho....
not even bug splat

ok now... the game finished the client showed me a victory screen
shows me that i am a leaver so no loot was given
the thing is i didnt even see the loading screen
the client went straight from the reconnect screen(stayed as i abandoned) to a finished play sreen...
it seriously so frustrating

i can spectate only after i reconnect a few times
it says i abandonded the game or some crap
far out
i dont care about my bans cuz i can wait for that
im scared ill get a permenant ban for trying to play one proper game
i really want to play please help me
